title: CORES Corporation / Non-Profit Search Receipt
description: Structured data for an Alberta CORES Corporation / Non-Profit Search receipt.

government_fee.description: Government fee charged for the service, in dollars. Example: 7.15

transaction_type.description: Description of the transaction type shown on the receipt.

customer_reference_number.description: Customer reference number shown on the receipt (e.g., your internal file or matter number).
